"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"ticket","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"submitTicket","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"submittedTickets","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint64[]","name":"","type":"uint64[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"ticketSubmissionTimeout","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"groupIndex","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawGroupMemberRewards","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"addServiceContract(address)":{"params":{"serviceContract":"Address of the service contract."}},"createGroup(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_newEntry":"New random beacon value that stakers will use to generate their tickets.","submitter":"Operator of this contract."}},"hasMinimumStake(address)":{"params":{"staker":"Staker's address"},"return":"True if has enough active stake to participate in the network, false otherwise."},"numberOfGroups()":{"details":"Even if numberOfGroups() > 0, it is still possible requesting for a new relay entry will revert with \"no active groups\" failure message. This function returns the number of active groups as they are currently marked on-chain. However, during relay request, before group selection, we run group expiration and it may happen that some groups seen as active turns out to be expired."},"relayEntry(bytes)":{"params":{"_groupSignature":"Group BLS signature over the concatenation of the previous entry and seed."}},"sign(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"previousEntry":"Previous relay entry","requestId":"Request Id trackable by service contract"}},"submitDkgResult(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256[])":{"params":{"groupPubKey":"Generated candidate group public key","misbehaved":"Bytes array of misbehaved (disqualified or inactive) group members indexes in ascending order; Indexes reflect positions of members in the group as outputted by the group selection protocol.","signatures":"Concatenation of signatures from members supporting the result.","signingMembersIndexes":"Indices of members corresponding to each signature.","submitterMemberIndex":"Claimed submitter candidate group member index"}},"submitTicket(bytes32)":{"params":{"ticket":"Bytes representation of a ticket that holds the following: - ticketValue: first 8 bytes of a result of keccak256 cryptography hash   function on the combination of the group selection seed (previous   beacon output), staker-specific value (address) and virtual staker index. - stakerValue: a staker-specific value which is the address of the staker. - virtualStakerIndex: 4-bytes number within a range of 1 to staker's weight;   has to be unique for all tickets submitted by the given staker for the   current candidate group selection."}},"withdrawGroupMemberRewards(address,uint256)":{"params":{"groupIndex":"Group index","operator":"Operator address"}}},"title":"KeepRandomBeaconOperator"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addServiceContract(address)":{"notice":"Adds service contract"},"createGroup(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Triggers the selection process of a new candidate group."},"entryVerificationFee()":{"notice":"Returns fee for entry verification in wei. Does not include group profit fee, DKG contribution or callback fee."},"genesis()":{"notice":"Triggers group selection if there are no active groups."},"getFirstActiveGroupIndex()":{"notice":"Gets the index of the first active group."},"getGroupMemberRewards(bytes)":{"notice":"Returns accumulated group member rewards for provided group."},"getGroupMembers(bytes)":{"notice":"Returns members of the given group by group public key."},"getGroupPublicKey(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets public key of the group with the given index."},"groupCreationFee()":{"notice":"Returns fee for group creation in wei. Includes the cost of DKG and the cost of triggering group selection."},"groupProfitFee()":{"notice":"Gets group profit fee expressed in wei."},"hasMinimumStake(address)":{"notice":"Checks if the specified account has enough active stake to become network operator and that this contract has been authorized for potential slashing.     /// Having the required minimum of active stake makes the operator eligible to join the network. If the active stake is not currently undelegating, operator is also eligible for work selection. "},"hasWithdrawnRewards(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Return whether the given operator has withdrawn their rewards from the given group."},"isEntryInProgress()":{"notice":"Returns true if generation of a new relay entry is currently in progress."},"isGroupRegistered(bytes)":{"notice":"Checks if group with the given public key is registered."},"isGroupSelectionPossible()":{"notice":"Checks if it is possible to fire a new group selection. Triggering new group selection is only possible when there is no pending group selection or when the pending group selection timed out."},"isStaleGroup(bytes)":{"notice":"Checks if a group with the given public key is a stale group. Stale group is an expired group which is no longer performing any operations. It is important to understand that an expired group may still perform some operations for which it was selected when it was still active. We consider a group to be stale when it's expired and when its expiration time and potentially executed operation timeout are both in the past."},"numberOfGroups()":{"notice":"Gets the number of active groups as currently marked in the contract. This is the state from when the expired groups were last updated without accounting for recent expirations. "},"refreshGasPrice()":{"notice":"Pulls the most recent gas price from gas price oracle."},"relayEntry(bytes)":{"notice":"Creates a new relay entry and stores the associated data on the chain."},"reportRelayEntryTimeout()":{"notice":"Function used to inform about the fact the currently ongoing new relay entry generation operation timed out. As a result, the group which was supposed to produce a new relay entry is immediately terminated and a new group is selected to produce a new relay entry. All members of the group are punished by seizing minimum stake of their tokens. The submitter of the transaction is rewarded with a tattletale reward which is limited to min(1, 20 / group_size) of the maximum tattletale reward."},"reportUnauthorizedSigning(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Reports unauthorized signing for the provided group. Must provide a valid signature of the tattletale address as a message. Successful signature verification means the private key has been leaked and all group members should be punished by seizing\u00a0their tokens. The submitter of this proof is rewarded with 5% of the total seized amount scaled by the reward adjustment parameter and the rest 95% is burned."},"selectedParticipants()":{"notice":"Gets selected participants in ascending order of their tickets."},"sign(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Creates a request to generate a new relay entry, which will include a random number (by signing the previous entry's random number)."},"submitDkgResult(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256[])":{"notice":"Submits result of DKG protocol. It is on-chain part of phase 14 of the protocol."},"submitTicket(bytes32)":{"notice":"Submits ticket to request to participate in a new candidate group."},"submittedTickets()":{"notice":"Gets the submitted group candidate tickets so far."},"ticketSubmissionTimeout()":{"notice":"Gets the timeout in blocks after which group candidate ticket submission is finished."},"withdrawGroupMemberRewards(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws accumulated group member rewards for operator using the provided group index. Once the accumulated reward is withdrawn from the selected group, the operator is flagged as withdrawn. Rewards can be withdrawn only from stale group."}},"notice":"Keep client facing contract for random beacon security-critical operations. Handles group creation and expiration, BLS signature verification and incentives. The contract is not upgradeable. New functionality can be implemented by deploying new versions following Keep client update and re-authorization by the stakers."}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/KeepRandomBeaconOperator.sol":"KeepRandomBeaconOperator"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/Authorizations.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd49b3840507c924cc37ac2da48bf1549013a79d84daf2cb106b4d4b9c6096e7a","urls":["bzz-raw://2b740d974564d027f9df04253f71ce2314839a682beac926b778e0f7ea59fbb5","dweb:/ipfs/QmamRuiYLpt2fCUPrQypkvrf7BrCsdV12QgaSHQYPsJHT2"]},"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/GasPriceOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0x52b2bde320e275d7fcec69299fd694139dd3dc7ed153ef566deeb17f105998b8","urls":["bzz-raw://99cdd9a44f12e22237d6cb07979b9a5e6a01019b6860165087d9de1d195c10b6","dweb:/ipfs/QmNgAsr8pnJ3KV14FmiDNtKGwAcGGQrwZhemMJv5pS6r78"]},"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/GrantStakingPolicy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d7604d5ccd4bf23b5aca39074183aabad98ce47bc74edd2023e7e0b1be6d1b5","urls":["bzz-raw://92fb21051ecfa9b9885b775c2cff1778cfbab3afe3b436e234a4f08181277983","dweb:/ipfs/QmPxQUWpL6iFcydJxyFsZjmWRnxziPVA2rqrgwhn6F7Tfe"]},"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/KeepRandomBeaconOperator.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0ea7ae0948ea60bb273093cc1a536a401348c3ea856f49b934db66251b057f51","urls":["bzz-raw://8014adfb59ead98de2d7eef67e5483f9c94b18ba7cdf8415bb3a4fd8b045249d","dweb:/ipfs/QmUDrjbsqfh2YznjZmkD5feifYMvuvo9fmdu53UsjLL5To"]},"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/KeepRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x723cf0ade28c4158935e6c22f1da1ee98252ad1bc1cac30fe8fa462fe36ea886","urls":["bzz-raw://6244a0370c42ae7bac430e646694d64b80397e02209ae9ec1e01776e6b5a49fc","dweb:/ipfs/QmcygjqGFv81ZpyKTUwdMRt1VdnM9H6pGUuKAP5YLmL5U8"]},"/Users/konrad/Desktop/rumble/fin/local-setup/keep-core/solidity/contracts/KeepTok nodes.name: KeepRandomBeaconOperator

nodes.documentation: @notice Triggers group selection if there are no active groups.
nodes.name: genesis

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not a service contract"

arguments.value: Caller is not a service contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not a service contract"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Adds service contract
 @param serviceContract Address of the service contract.
nodes.name: addServiceContract

nodes.documentation: @notice Pulls the most recent gas price from gas price oracle.
nodes.name: refreshGasPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

nodes.name: createGroup
isGroupSelectionPossible
submitTicket

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the timeout in blocks after which group candidate ticket
 submission is finished.
nodes.name: ticketSubmissionTimeout

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the submitted group candidate tickets so far.
nodes.name: submittedTickets

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct GroupSelection.Storage storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets selected participants in ascending order of their tickets.
nodes.name: selectedParticipants

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct DKGResultVerification.Storage storage pointer,uint256,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256) view
function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory,address[] memory,bytes memory)

nodes.name: submitDkgResult

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

nodes.documentation:
@notice Compare the reimbursement fee calculated based on the current
 transaction gas price and the current price feed estimate with the DKG
 reimbursement fee calculated and paid at the moment when the DKG was
 requested. If there is any surplus, it will be returned to the DKG fee
 pool of the service contract which triggered the DKG.
nodes.name: reimburseDkgSubmitter
sign

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bytes memory)
function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) view returns (bool)
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

nodes.name: relayEntry

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))
function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

nodes.documentation:
@notice Executes customer specified callback for the relay entry request.
 @param entry The generated random number.
nodes.name: executeCallback

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get rewards breakdown in wei for successful entry for the
 current signing request.
nodes.name: newEntryRewardsBreakdown

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns true if generation of a new relay entry is currently in
 progress.
nodes.name: isEntryInProgress
hasEntryTimedOut

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function used to inform about the fact the currently ongoing
 new relay entry generation operation timed out. As a result, the group
 which was supposed to produce a new relay entry is immediately
 terminated and a new group is selected to produce a new relay entry.
 All members of the group are punished by seizing minimum stake of
 their tokens. The submitter of the transaction is rewarded with a
 tattletale reward which is limited to min(1, 20 / group_size) of the
 maximum tattletale reward.
nodes.name: reportRelayEntryTimeout

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets group profit fee expressed in wei.
nodes.name: groupProfitFee
hasMinimumStake

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @notice Checks if group with the given public key is registered.
nodes.name: isGroupRegistered

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if a group with the given public key is a stale group.
 Stale group is an expired group which is no longer performing any
 operations. It is important to understand that an expired group may
 still perform some operations for which it was selected when it was still
 active. We consider a group to be stale when it's expired and when its
 expiration time and potentially executed operation timeout are both in
 the past.
nodes.name: isStaleGroup

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the number of active groups as currently marked in the
 contract. This is the state from when the expired groups were last updated
 without accounting for recent expirations.

    /// @dev Even if numberOfGroups() > 0, it is still possible requesting for
 a new relay entry will revert with "no active groups" failure message.
 This function returns the number of active groups as they are currently
 marked on-chain. However, during relay request, before group selection,
 we run group expiration and it may happen that some groups seen as active
 turns out to be expired.
nodes.name: numberOfGroups

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns accumulated group member rewards for provided group.
nodes.name: getGroupMemberRewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,address,uint256) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Return whether the given operator has withdrawn their rewards
 from the given group.
nodes.name: hasWithdrawnRewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (bytes memory) payable returns (bool,bytes memory))

nodes.name: withdrawGroupMemberRewards

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the index of the first active group.
nodes.name: getFirstActiveGroupIndex

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bytes memory)

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets public key of the group with the given index.
nodes.name: getGroupPublicKey

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns fee for entry verification in wei. Does not include group
 profit fee, DKG contribution or callback fee.
nodes.name: entryVerificationFee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns fee for group creation in wei. Includes the cost of DKG
 and the cost of triggering group selection.
nodes.name: groupCreationFee

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory) view returns (address[] memory)

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns members of the given group by group public key.
nodes.name: getGroupMembers

nodes.documentation:
@notice Reports unauthorized signing for the provided group. Must provide
 a valid signature of the tattletale address as a message. Successful signature
 verification means the private key has been leaked and all group members
 should be punished by seizing their tokens. The submitter of this proof is
 rewarded with 5% of the total seized amount scaled by the reward adjustment
 parameter and the rest 95% is burned.
nodes.name: reportUnauthorizedSigning

attributes.documentation:
@notice Compare the reimbursement fee calculated based on the current
 transaction gas price and the current price feed estimate with the DKG
 reimbursement fee calculated and paid at the moment when the DKG was
 requested. If there is any surplus, it will be returned to the DKG fee
 pool of the service contract which triggered the DKG.
attributes.name: reimburseDkgSubmitter

@notice Returns true if generation of a new relay entry is currently in
 progress.
attributes.name: isEntryInProgress
hasEntryTimedOut

attributes.documentation:
@notice Function used to inform about the fact the currently ongoing
 new relay entry generation operation timed out. As a result, the group
 which was supposed to produce a new relay entry is immediately
 terminated and a new group is selected to produce a new relay entry.
 All members of the group are punished by seizing minimum stake of
 their tokens. The submitter of the transaction is rewarded with a
 tattletale reward which is limited to min(1, 20 / group_size) of the
 maximum tattletale reward.
attributes.name: reportRelayEntryTimeout

attributes.documentation: @notice Gets group profit fee expressed in wei.
attributes.name: groupProfitFee
hasMinimumStake

attributes.documentation: @notice Checks if group with the given public key is registered.
attributes.name: isGroupRegistered

attributes.type: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory) view returns (bool)

attributes.documentation:
@notice Checks if a group with the given public key is a stale group.
 Stale group is an expired group which is no longer performing any
 operations. It is important to understand that an expired group may
 still perform some operations for which it was selected when it was still
 active. We consider a group to be stale when it's expired and when its
 expiration time and potentially executed operation timeout are both in
 the past.
attributes.name: isStaleGroup

attributes.type: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,bytes memory) view returns (bool)

attributes.documentation:
@notice Gets the number of active groups as currently marked in the
 contract. This is the state from when the expired groups were last updated
 without accounting for recent expirations.

    /// @dev Even if numberOfGroups() > 0, it is still possible requesting for
 a new relay entry will revert with "no active groups" failure message.
 This function returns the number of active groups as they are currently
 marked on-chain. However, during relay request, before group selection,
 we run group expiration and it may happen that some groups seen as active
 turns out to be expired.
attributes.name: numberOfGroups

attributes.type: function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

struct Groups.Group storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Groups.Storage storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

attributes.documentation:
@notice Reports unauthorized signing for the provided group. Must provide
 a valid signature of the tattletale address as a message. Successful signature
 verification means the private key has been leaked and all group members
 should be punished by seizing their tokens. The submitter of this proof is
 rewarded with 5% of the total seized amount scaled by the reward adjustment
 parameter and the rest 95% is burned.
attributes.name: reportUnauthorizedSigning

params._newEntry: New random beacon value that stakers will use to generate their tickets.

hasMinimumStake(address).return: True if has enough active stake to participate in the network, false otherwise.

numberOfGroups().details: Even if numberOfGroups() > 0, it is still possible requesting for a new relay entry will revert with "no active groups" failure message. This function returns the number of active groups as they are currently marked on-chain. However, during relay request, before group selection, we run group expiration and it may happen that some groups seen as active turns out to be expired.

params._groupSignature: Group BLS signature over the concatenation of the previous entry and seed.

params.requestId: Request Id trackable by service contract

params.misbehaved: Bytes array of misbehaved (disqualified or inactive) group members indexes in ascending order; Indexes reflect positions of members in the group as outputted by the group selection protocol.
params.signatures: Concatenation of signatures from members supporting the result.
params.signingMembersIndexes: Indices of members corresponding to each signature.
params.submitterMemberIndex: Claimed submitter candidate group member index

params.ticket: Bytes representation of a ticket that holds the following: - ticketValue: first 8 bytes of a result of keccak256 cryptography hash   function on the combination of the group selection seed (previous   beacon output), staker-specific value (address) and virtual staker index. - stakerValue: a staker-specific value which is the address of the staker. - virtualStakerIndex: 4-bytes number within a range of 1 to staker's weight;   has to be unique for all tickets submitted by the given staker for the   current candidate group selection.

createGroup(uint256,address).notice: Triggers the selection process of a new candidate group.

entryVerificationFee().notice: Returns fee for entry verification in wei. Does not include group profit fee, DKG contribution or callback fee.

genesis().notice: Triggers group selection if there are no active groups.

getFirstActiveGroupIndex().notice: Gets the index of the first active group.

getGroupMemberRewards(bytes).notice: Returns accumulated group member rewards for provided group.

getGroupMembers(bytes).notice: Returns members of the given group by group public key.

getGroupPublicKey(uint256).notice: Gets public key of the group with the given index.

groupCreationFee().notice: Returns fee for group creation in wei. Includes the cost of DKG and the cost of triggering group selection.

groupProfitFee().notice: Gets group profit fee expressed in wei.

hasMinimumStake(address).notice: Checks if the specified account has enough active stake to become network operator and that this contract has been authorized for potential slashing.     /// Having the required minimum of active stake makes the operator eligible to join the network. If the active stake is not currently undelegating, operator is also eligible for work selection.

hasWithdrawnRewards(address,uint256).notice: Return whether the given operator has withdrawn their rewards from the given group.

isEntryInProgress().notice: Returns true if generation of a new relay entry is currently in progress.

isGroupRegistered(bytes).notice: Checks if group with the given public key is registered.

isGroupSelectionPossible().notice: Checks if it is possible to fire a new group selection. Triggering new group selection is only possible when there is no pending group selection or when the pending group selection timed out.

isStaleGroup(bytes).notice: Checks if a group with the given public key is a stale group. Stale group is an expired group which is no longer performing any operations. It is important to understand that an expired group may still perform some operations for which it was selected when it was still active. We consider a group to be stale when it's expired and when its expiration time and potentially executed operation timeout are both in the past.

numberOfGroups().notice: Gets the number of active groups as currently marked in the contract. This is the state from when the expired groups were last updated without accounting for recent expirations.

refreshGasPrice().notice: Pulls the most recent gas price from gas price oracle.

relayEntry(bytes).notice: Creates a new relay entry and stores the associated data on the chain.

reportRelayEntryTimeout().notice: Function used to inform about the fact the currently ongoing new relay entry generation operation timed out. As a result, the group which was supposed to produce a new relay entry is immediately terminated and a new group is selected to produce a new relay entry. All members of the group are punished by seizing minimum stake of their tokens. The submitter of the transaction is rewarded with a tattletale reward which is limited to min(1, 20 / group_size) of the maximum tattletale reward.

reportUnauthorizedSigning(uint256,bytes).notice: Reports unauthorized signing for the provided group. Must provide a valid signature of the tattletale address as a message. Successful signature verification means the private key has been leaked and all group members should be punished by seizing their tokens. The submitter of this proof is rewarded with 5% of the total seized amount scaled by the reward adjustment parameter and the rest 95% is burned.

selectedParticipants().notice: Gets selected participants in ascending order of their tickets.

sign(uint256,bytes).notice: Creates a request to generate a new relay entry, which will include a random number (by signing the previous entry's random number).

submitDkgResult(uint256,bytes,bytes,byte.notice: Submits result of DKG protocol. It is on-chain part of phase 14 of the protocol.

submitTicket(bytes32).notice: Submits ticket to request to participate in a new candidate group.

submittedTickets().notice: Gets the submitted group candidate tickets so far.

ticketSubmissionTimeout().notice: Gets the timeout in blocks after which group candidate ticket submission is finished.

withdrawGroupMemberRewards(address,uint2.notice: Withdraws accumulated group member rewards for operator using the provided group index. Once the accumulated reward is withdrawn from the selected group, the operator is flagged as withdrawn. Rewards can be withdrawn only from stale group.

userdoc.notice: Keep client facing contract for random beacon security-critical operations. Handles group creation and expiration, BLS signature verification and incentives. The contract is not upgradeable. New functionality can be implemented by deploying new versions following Keep client update and re-authorization by the stakers.
